com.paypal.selion.utils.process

Class AbstractProcessHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.process.AbstractProcessHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnixProcessHandler, WindowsProcessHandler

    public abstract class AbstractProcessHandler
extends Object
    This class captures most of the heavy lifting required in terms of finding the default set of processes which are to be ear marked for cleansing and also the core part of cleaning up these processes. The sub classes of this class cater to the default recycling logic that comes pre-built in SeLion.
